did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files
1989-1990

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-2/1/2.921, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred on 1992 September 7.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These files constitute the major record series generated by Robert O'Neil, the President of the University of Virginia. The records consist chiefly of correspondence, but also include reports, minutes, clippings, memoranda, and related papers concerning all areas of business of the president's office.
The papers consist of: general files, 1989-1990; seldom used permanent files, 1972-1991; University committee files, 1989-1990; and, task force files, 1989-1990.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
SERIES I: General Files, 1989-1990 Boxes 1-43
SERIES II: Seldom Used Permanent Files, 1972-1991 Boxes 43-45
SERIES III: University Committees Files, 1989-1990 Box 45-47
SERIES IV: Task Force Files, 1989-1990 Box 47
SERIES V: Restricted Materials, 1989-1990 Box 48
